keyToStrMap.Full:
Nigel the Night Watchman

Occupation:
[] Night watchman (previously a policeman)

Likes:
[] Being in the TV section of electronics stores, TV quiz shows

Dislikes:
[] Sunrise, pigeons

Favourite quote:
[] Every move you make I'll be watching you

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My uncle, a night watchman who has seen everything!

How I came to be here:
[] Accidentally ate poison berries because it was dark

What I wish:
[] To be a TV quiz show contestant
